name: party-game-sentences
description: Trivia, would you rather, never have I ever and truth or dare sentences.

scripts.build: esbuild --out-extension:.js=.cjs --outdir=dist --platform=node --format=cjs src/index.ts --tsconfig=tsconfig.cjs.json && esbuild --out-extension:.js=.mjs --outdir=dist --platform=node --format=esm src/index.ts --tsconfig=tsconfig.mjs.json && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly -p tsconfig.cjs.json && xcopy /s /Y "src\json\*.*" "dist\json\"
